お茶の子さいさい: (おちゃのこさいさい) - It's a piece of cake; It's a simple task; It's a cinch
お茶を濁す: (おちゃをにごす) - to be evasive/to give an evasive answer; to speak ambiguously/to prevaricate; to cook up a specious story to get out of an uncomfortable situation; to make do with
お茶汲み: (おちゃくみ) - serving tea (esp. at a company); tea server; tea lady
お茶漬: (おちゃづけ) - rice with tea poured on it (Japanese dish)
お茶漬け: (おちゃづけ) - rice with tea poured on it (Japanese dish)
お茶目: (おちゃめ) - playfulness; mischief; urchin; wag
お草々: (おそうそう) - neglectful (i.e. in the treatment of one's guests)
お草々様: (おそうそうさま) - neglectful (i.e. in the treatment of one's guests)
お草草: (おそうそう) - neglectful (i.e. in the treatment of one's guests)
お草草様: (おそうそうさま) - neglectful (i.e. in the treatment of one's guests)
お荷物: (おにもつ) - baggage/luggage; burden/albatross around one's neck/excess baggage
お菜: (オカズ) - accompaniment for rice dishes/side dish; (おかず, オカズ only) (sometimes オガズ) food for thought (esp. in the context of conversation, or material for assisting arousal during masturbation)
お萩: (おはぎ) - rice ball coated with sweetened red beans, soybean flour or sesame
お蔭: (おかげ) - grace (of God)/benevolence (of Buddha)/blessing; assistance/help/aid; effects/influence
お蔭で: (おかげで) - thanks to ...; owing to ...; because of ...
お蔭参り: (おかげまいり) - pilgrimage to Ise
お蔭様: (おかげさま) - (somebody's) backing; assistance; thanks to (somebody)
お蔭様で: (おかげさまで) - (I'm fine) thank you; thanks to you; fortunately; under the gods' shadow
お蔵: (オクラ) - shelving (a play, movie, etc.)/closing down/cancelling/canceling/shelf (i.e. "on the shelf"); rice storehouse of the Edo shogunate
お蔵入り: (おくらいり) - being postponed; being shelved; being put on hold
お薦め: (おすすめ) - recommendation; advice; suggestion; encouragement
お袋の味: (おふくろのあじ) - mom's home cooking; taste of mom's cooking; taste of home cooking; food like mom used to make
お裾分け: (おすそわけ) - sharing with others what has been given to you; sharing a portion of the profit with others
お見それ: (おみそれ) - failing to recognize someone; underestimation
お見外れ: (おみそれ) - failing to recognize someone; underestimation
お見知りおき: (おみしりおき) - pleased to make your acquaintance (formal phrase used on first meeting someone to encourage them to remember you)
お見知り置き: (おみしりおき) - pleased to make your acquaintance (formal phrase used on first meeting someone to encourage them to remember you)
お見舞: (おみまい) - calling on someone who is ill; enquiry; inquiry
お見舞い: (おみまい) - calling on someone who is ill; enquiry; inquiry
お見舞い申し上げる: (おみまいもうしあげる) - you have my deepest sympathy
お見逃しなく: (おみのがしなく) - Don't miss it
お見通し: (おみとおし) - seeing through (e.g. a trick, someone's mind)
お見逸れ: (おみそれ) - failing to recognize someone; underestimation
お触れ: (おふれ) - official notice; (お触れ, 御触れ only)   Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) usu. to the general populace
お触書: (おふれがき) - Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) usu. to the general populace
お言葉: (おことば) - availing myself of your kind offer/taking you at your word; (みことば only) God's word/word of God
お詰: (おつめ) - lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony; tea master
お詰め: (おつめ) - lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony; tea master
お誂え向き: (おあつらえむき) - perfect; just right; ideal
お誕生おめでとうございます: (おたんじょうおめでとうございます) - congratulations on the birth of your baby
お誕生会: (おたんじょうかい) - birthday party
お誕生日おめでとう: (おたんじょうびおめでとう) - Happy Birthday
お誕生日おめでとうございます: (おたんじょうびおめでとうございます) - Happy Birthday
お調子者: (おちょうしもの) - (yoji) flip; luck-pusher; frivolous person; person who readily chimes in with others; person who gets carried away easily
お談義: (おだんぎ) - lecture (i.e. an admonishment); sermon
お負け: (おまけ) - freebie (e.g. with a purchase)/something additional/bonus/an extra; price reduction/discount; exaggeration
お負けに: (おまけに) - to make matters worse; besides; what's more; in addition; on top of that
お買い得: (おかいどく) - bargain; good buy; budget
お買い徳: (おかいどく) - bargain; good buy; budget
お買得: (おかいどく) - bargain; good buy; budget
お買徳: (おかいどく) - bargain; good buy; budget
お足: (おあし) - money; coin; dough; moolah; brass
お迎え: (おむかえ) - receiving/welcoming/going to meet; final call/call of fate/approach of death
お返し: (おかえし) - return gift/return favour (favor); revenge; change (in a cash transaction)
お通夜: (おつや) - all-night vigil over a body; wake
お達し: (おたっし) - notice or order handed down from above/announcement/notification; Edo-period proclamation issued by the shogunate (or a daimyo, etc.) to the concerned parties
お遣い: (おつかい) - errand/mission/going as envoy; messenger/bearer/errand boy/errand girl; familiar spirit
お邪魔: (おじゃま) - (suru and itasu verb forms are used as set phrases said prior to entering or leaving someone's home)  hindrance; intrusion
お邪魔します: (おじゃまします) - excuse me for disturbing (interrupting) you; greeting used when entering someone's home
お邪魔虫: (おじゃまむし) - someone who gets in the way without serving any useful purpose; fly in the ointment; buttinsky; third wheel
お酌: (おしゃく) - pouring alcohol; person pouring alcohol for guests or customers (typically a woman); (apprentice) geisha/dancing girl
お釈迦: (おしゃか) - poorly made or ruined articles; the Buddha
お釈迦様の誕生日: (おしゃかさまのたんじょうび) - Buddha's birthday
お里: (おさと) - one's parents' home; one's origins/one's upbringing/one's past
お里が知れる: (おさとがしれる) - to reveal one's upbringing (through one's words, actions, etc.); to betray one's origin; to give oneself away
お金をおろす: (おかねをおろす) - to withdraw money; to take money out
